entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to flurries this evening and ending before morning then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming north 30 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 40 percent chance of flurries later in the afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 2.
